DOC.brief_summary: Only one study evaluate effect TENS LUTD Parkinson 's syndrome . It report congress `` Société Interdisciplinaire Francophone d'UroDynamique et de Pelvi-Perinéologie '' ( SIFUD-PP ) 2011 Ohanessian et al. , comprise 6 female patient Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) multisystem atrophy ( MSA ) , overactive bladder . Transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation , 20 minute daily 6 week , associate subjective improvement LUTD assess Patient Global Impression Improvement ( PGI-I ) 5 6 patient . In view encouraging result pilot study , hypothesize TENS treatment may improve LUTD patient Parkinson 's syndrome , Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) multisystem atrophy ( MSA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) Lower Urinary Tract Disorders Parkinson 's Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The principal objective compare efficacy transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation posterior tibial nerve placebo stimulation , apply 20 minute daily 3 month , Lower Urinary Tract Disorders ( LUTD ) patient Parkinson 's disease multisystem atrophy , evaluate use PGI-I ( Patient Global Impression improvement ) tool . The secondary objective compare efficacy TENS placebo stimulation change before/after 3 month treatment : - intensity urinary symptom , evaluate use Patient Global Impression Severity ( PGI-S ) scale - number voiding 24 hour , number episode urinary incontinence 24 hour maximum bladder capacity , evaluate void diary 3 day - urinary symptom , evaluate urinary symptom profile ( USP ) questionnaire - quality life , assess Qualiveen-SF® questionnaire - post-void residual volume measure bladder ultrasound effect development infectious complication , compare number urinary infection 3 month group . Lastly , safety TENS compare placebo stimulation occurrence adverse event 3 month treatment .
DOC.criteria: Established diagnosis Parkinson disease multisystem atrophy Refractory low urinary tract disorder contraindication intolerance usual oral treatment Patient capable complete questionnaire Patient whose write informed consent obtain Patient register social security scheme Pregnancy breastfeed Contraindications TENS ( local skin problem , metal ankle joint replacement , cardiac pacemaker , peripheral neuropathy , subthalamic deep brain stimulation ) Associated neurological disorder ( stroke , dementia , multiple sclerosis , spinal cord lesion , peripheral neuropathy ) urological disorder ( bladder outlet obstruction , cancer , pelvic organ prolapse , interstitial cystitis ) Unilateral neurological disability Legally incompetent patient , patient legal protection Participation another study present study
